Package com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.virtual

Interface VirtualTerminalListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TerminalResizeListener

    public interface VirtualTerminalListener
extends TerminalResizeListener
    Listener class for VirtualTerminal that allows you to receive callbacks on certain events. Please note that while this extends TerminalResizeListener and can be attached to a VirtualTerminal through Terminal.addResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener), in that case only the resize event will fire on the listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onBell​()
      Called when the Terminal.bell() method is invoked on the VirtualTerminal
      void onClose​()
      Called when the Terminal.close() method is invoked on the VirtualTerminal
      void onFlush​()
      Called when the Terminal.flush() method is invoked on the VirtualTerminal
